info.name: Clever Connections Challenges
info.attribution:
Layout, design, and library image by LawDawg96. Released to the Public Domain under CC0.

Wood grain background by RyanPro available under the Pixabay license from https://pixabay.com/photos/trees-wood-yellow-wood-oak-1915247/
info.description: In this set of games based on the original Clever Connections, use cards or dice to match as many colors as possible. But in order to score higher, you cannot leave the score for any color too low.
info.helpText:
This module contains two of the three mini-games in the "similar to" collection. The game involving tiles is not included.

Scoring in both games uses the bars representing each color next to the player's seat. Each click increases the score by one. A double-click decreases the score by one. Alternatively, place the cursor over the top of the colored part of the bar until the cursor symbol changes to a double-ended arrow. Click and drag to move the colored part of the bar.

Cards

Similar to Einfach Genial: Das Kartenspiel.

Players take seats and press the restart button. A random player is assigned to start and each player is dealt a face up card (two cards for two players) and a hand of six cards.

When a card is in the hand, click to rotate it 180 degrees or double-click to play it into the middle.

After comparing colors and scoring, press the hand icon to automatically move cards to their new positions and refill the hand to six cards. Instead of refilling the hand, if your hand does not contain any colors that match your lowest score(s), you can swap out your cards. To do this, press the swap icon at the top of the screen next to the deck. The old cards will be displayed for all to see for a few seconds, after which six new cards are moved to the hand and the old cards moved to the discard pile. Pressing either button automatically moves the turn indicator.

If the draw pile is reduced to zero cards, the discard pile is automatically shuffled and moved to the draw pile.

Dice

Similar to Einfach Genial: Das WÃ¼rfelspiel.

Players take seats and press the restart button. A random player is assigned to start and each player gets dice based on the number of players. 

During each turn, a player rolls all of their dice by pressing the button with the dice icon.

Press the turn button in the middle of the screen to move the turn indicator to the next player.

fields.text: This will completely reset the board and start a new game. Are you sure?
